name: DOCS_RCVD_SUPG_PROV_INFO
description: This table contains information about the supervising provider of the e-prescription.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the supervising provider record.

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_NAME
columns.description: Name for the supervising provider

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_WORK_PH
columns.description: Work phone number for the supervising provider

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_FAX
columns.description: Fax number for the supervising provider

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_EMAIL
columns.description: E-mail address for the supervising provider

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_ADD_STREE
columns.description: Street address for the supervising provider

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_ADDR_CITY
columns.description: City for the supervising provider work address

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_ADDR_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: The specialties ID for the supervising provider work address

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_ADDR_ZIP
columns.description: Zip code for the supervising provider work address

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_SPEC_NAME
columns.description: Free text list of supervising provider specialty names

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description: The state category ID for the supervising provider.

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_DEA_NUM
columns.description: DEA number of the supervising provider

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_ST_LIC_NU
columns.description: State license number of the supervising provider

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_NPI
columns.description: National Provider Identifier (NPI) number of the supervising provider

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_CLINIC_NM
columns.description: Clinic name where the supervising provider practices

columns.name: ERX_IS_REFILL_FOLLOWUP_YN
columns.description: Identifies whether the provider on this line of the group is a refill follow-up provider.

columns.name: SUPG_PROV_NAME_SUFFIX
columns.description: Stores suffixes for the supervising provider's name.
